title: New Feature: Introducing Backlink Analytics to our SEO Toolkit | Similarweb
description: We’re excited to announce the launch of a new module on Similarweb: Backlink Analytics. Here’s more about our new link checker and how SEOs can use it.
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesNew Feature: Introducing Backlink Analytics to our SEO Toolkit Updates New Feature: Introducing Backlink Analytics to our SEO Toolkit Start your free trial by Adelle Kehoe , Director of Content Marketing 2 Min. February 14, 2024 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Today we are delighted to announce a brand new feature launch: Backlinks Analytics. This feature empowers SEOs to navigate the complex world of backlinking with precision and confidence. Our backlink checker boasts an impressive database, indexing a staggering 360 trillion links across 200 million domains – all updated daily. This tool is available from today to all existing account-managed customers of Similarweb, free of charge. Assess your own backlink performance Monitoring your backlink profile is super easy with Similarweb’s Backlink Analytics. In three reports, see your: Overall link numbers Performance Backlink profile Every domain sending a link your way You can even see the countries and top-level domains driving the most backlinks to your site. With beautifully visualized reports, see how your performance changes over time, where you’ve won and lost backlinks, and even go deep into your no follow vs do follow link percentage. With comprehensive insights into your link ecosystem, you can make informed decisions to enhance your site’s performance and visibility. Competitor backlink analysis Here’s the thing: context is everything in SEO. With a thorough competitor backlink analysis, you get just that – and guess what? Our new Backlink Analytics tool allows you to view all reports and backlink metrics for any website in the world. Check out your competition to see their backlink profile, and get granular with the actual domains and pages sending links their way. Crafting a robust link-building strategy is essential for boosting your site’s authority and visibility. With our backlinks analytics, you can unlock valuable insights from your competitors’ strategies to fuel your outreach efforts and establish meaningful connections within your industry. Link up with Similarweb for SEO success “Similarweb has always provided unique datasets for SEO managers to evaluate sources of traffic, performance, engagement and benchmarking at any granularity. With the new backlink analytics tool, we continue to expand this visibility on any brand strategy in acquiring and managing backlinks overtime. SEO managers, content creators and digital PR professionals will be able to evaluate websites by referring domains, types of backlink, keywords and pages.” Said Baruch Toledano, VP of Similarweb’s Search Solution. So whether you’re optimizing your site’s performance on search, monitoring your competitors, or refining your link building strategies, Similarweb’s Backlink Analytics provides the data points you need to get – and stay – ahead. Try it now. Enjoy 360° digital visibility, 24/7 The all-in-one solution for data-driven planning and competitor analysis Try Similarweb for free today by Adelle Kehoe Director of Content Marketing Adelle is passionate about content and has a strong background in content creation, SEO, and marketing. She has helped companies of all sizes enhance their online presence. Related Topics: Product Updates This post is subject to Similarweb legal notices and disclaimers.
